description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables, and accessories worldwide.
Microsoft Corporation develops, licenses, and supports software, services, devices, and solutions worldwide.
Tesla, Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, leases, and sells electric vehicles, and energy generation and storage systems.
Alphabet Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides online advertising services in the United States and internationally.
Amazon.com, Inc. engages in the retail sale of consumer products and subscriptions in North America and internationally.
Meta Platforms, Inc. develops products that enable people to connect and share with friends and family through mobile devices and personal computers.
Netflix, Inc. provides subscription streaming entertainment services.
NVIDIA Corporation operates as a visual computing company worldwide.
Intel Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells computer products and technologies worldwide.
Cisco Systems, Inc. designs and sells a range of technologies that power the Internet.
